titles: A vvarning to drunkards by the sad and suddain death of John Woolman, of Sarret, in the county of Hartford. With a letter of exhortation written to the people on that sorrowful occasion. By William Jole, minister of Sarret.
author: Jole, William, d. ca. 1702.
publisher: printed for N.P. and sold by Rich. Janua, in Queens-Head Court, in Pater-Noster Row,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Woolman, John, --  of Sanet --  Early works to 1800.
